### **Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

#### Acquisition Information
* Solicitation Number: T8493-24-0009
* Solicitation Date: 2024-05-23
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-06-14 (10:00 a.m. EST)

#### Brief Description
Transport Canada, Aircraft Services, is seeking a qualified supplier to provide bypass switches for Bell 412 helicopters. This acquisition falls under the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) 336611 - Aircraft equipment.

#### Key Information
* Supply Arrangement (SA) T8493-140035 Series
* Procurement Category: Goods (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

#### Tender Description
This procurement seeks to acquire bypass switches for Bell 412 helicopters. The supplier must be a qualified holder of Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series. Only the following companies have been invited to submit proposals: Pratt & Whitney, Simex, Alpine, Bristow Instruments, Canada West Avionics, Kitchener Aero, and Aero Supplies. The full RFP documents will be distributed electronically by the Contracting Officer.

#### Contact Details
* Contact Name: Yula Zourdos
* Contact Title: Procurement Specialist
* Contact Department: Aircraft Services Directorate, Transportation Canada
* Contact Address: 200 Comet Private, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1V 9B2
* Contact Email: [yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca](mailto:yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: (343) 552-8343

#### Additional Opportunities for Qualification
Transport Canada is committed to conducting procurements in a fair and open manner consistent with Canada's Trade Agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Existing suppliers not qualified for this specific contract opportunity are encouraged to take advantage of the Notice opportunities posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS), which allows them to become qualified for future contract opportunities. Yula Zourdos, Procurement Specialist, can be contacted for further information regarding supplier qualification at the above contact details.  [yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca](mailto:yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca) (343) 552-8343.  \\
